app.title: wordwank
app.select_blank: CHOOSE A LETTER FOR BLANK TILE
app.waiting_next_game: Waiting for next game to start...
app.rules_summary: Wordwank is a high-speed vocabulary duel! Use your tiles to form the highest scoring (or weirdest) word before time runs out. Letter values are based on their frequency in the wank sock: common letters are worth 1 point, while rarer letters earn progressively more (up to 9 points). The two rarest 'Unicorn' letters are worth 10 points! One letter each day is worth 7 points. Scoring is dynamic: find a Unique Word (+5) or aim for Length Bonuses (+5 for 6 letters, doubling for every letter after). Careful: duplicating a word gives you 0 points, but awards a bonus to the original player!
app.donate_desc: Love the game? Great, so do I! Hi, I'm Ron "Quinn" Straight, and I wrote this thing with my artificial friends. I'm an old gen-X hacker with two girls in college, and I've been unemployed for over a year, so every two bits helps. Whenever you're feeling it. Love you, man.
app.donate_footer: Thank you so much for choosing to wank your words with us.
app.invite_notify: {{name}} has started wanking words in {{lang}}! Join them at {{url}}

results.title: GAME OVER
results.riveting: Everyone just stared at the screen. Riveting.
results.next_game_soon: Click anywhere or press any key to play again...
results.solo_wanker: Unfortunately, a lonely wanker gets no points.

auth.welcome_back: Welcome back, explorer! Ready to continue?
auth.secure_passkey_desc: One-tap biometric login for your next duel.
auth.privacy_hint: We only use your email for account recovery and to sync your sanity across devices.
auth.anonymous_disclaimer: We never says who plays, but if you want to keep your wank rank, sign in with one of the below.
